reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater soft and luxurious, with good quality and a nice color.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, smooth and pretty
items.body: Soft, smooth medium-thick knit, and a loose turtleneck that won't strangle your neck. I got the white and will wear it with a white vest when the weather gets cooler. It's not clingy and will accommodate a T-shirt underneath for cold days. I washed it with light colors in the washer and dried it in the dryer. It's still soft and comfy with no shrinkage. The fabric is man-made. I often wear XL in sweaters, but this one is perfect in Large. It is described as "loose fit," so I sized down. It's still plenty roomy but has a sleeker look. No see-through problem. This sweater is on trend for 2025-26 winter because it is not super long (it is mid-hip) if you size down. Really beautiful, and I can't wait to wear with jeans and boots. Read more
items.author: Delsie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality and fit!
items.body: This sweater is soft and feels, fits, and looks more expensive than the price. I plan to buy more or give this sweater as a gift. The chocolate brown color is perfect. Read more
items.author: Hannah Kennedy

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Really nice color and fit
items.body: Beautiful chocolate brown color. Nice fabric, sweater knit. I ordered xl and love the fit. It’s a little big but I love loose fit. Very soft and comfortable! Read more
items.author: tialynne

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality sweater
items.body: The fit is perfect, the neck is t too tight. Material is nice and soft, even after 5 washes. I lay dry most times but was in a hurry one time and threw in the dryer to finish, came out nice, no shrinking. Read more
items.author: Jessica Payson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Warm and soft - great colors
items.body: This is great sweater for winter, warm, soft and not too tight. The material is great and can be dressed up or down. I bought three and will probably get another. Read more
items.author: Peggy Hartman

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent quality.
items.body: The quality, color and fit was excellent but decided I didn't need it and returned it. However, this season, I have bought several 100% wool V-neck sweaters from this same company and I love them because of the quality. The sewing and finish on everything is really nice. Also, they are not too thick or thin - for my needs (I layer), the thickness is perfect. Read more
items.author: Lemonblossoms

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Runs very large!
items.body: This sweater says it’s oversized, and they aren’t kidding. I ordered my usual size (L) in green based on the size chart, and it was huge. The neck also seems to be thicker than the fabric on the body (which is just meh), so it’s bulky and not really comfortable. Decided to return it because I didn’t love it, though the color was gorgeous. Read more
items.author: BaseballMom

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice sweater
items.body: I like this sweater. The color is true too the photos. It runs on the large side. The fabric is soft. I would buy again Read more
items.author: Cg

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Light Brown, Brown, Olive Green, Burnt Orange, Army Green, Black, Navy Blue, Dark Green, Light Blue, Red, Wine Red, Khaki, Pink, White. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
